Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Dharsi.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Dharsi
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Dharsi
Message: Good afternoon! How is it going?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's going alright. How is it going for you?

Author: Dharsi
Message: I am doing good as well. It's nice to be on break.

Author: Andrew
Message: Break from school?

Author: Dharsi
Message: Yes, I'm studying Computer Science. Which is why this study picked my interest. What about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study biology actually. I'm on my 3rd year.

Author: Dharsi
Message: That's an interesting field. One I couldn't wrap my head around in high school, but hey, to each their own, I guess. What do you plan on doing with these studies?

Author: Andrew
Message: I want to learn more about the brain, the way it works, how and why. I'm mostly interested in neurology.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Whoa, that's, like, one of the most complicated fields of study. Props to you.

Author: Andrew
Message: Thank you! What about you?

Author: Dharsi
Message: What do you mean?

Author: Andrew
Message: I mean, what do you do?

Author: Dharsi
Message: Well, for now my studies are mostly about maths, with little actual computing, but that will change.

Author: Andrew
Message: Maths have never been my forte... What kind of computing would you like to do? Making programs? AI?

Author: Dharsi
Message: I'm hesitating between software development and networking. Although there are other fields that might interest me later on.

Author: Andrew
Message: Games maybe?

Author: Dharsi
Message: That probably counts as software development, as games are, after all, software. No, I was talking about R&D, AI, Modeling, and the Internet of objects.

Author: Andrew
Message: Internet of objects like, internet for printers, watches and all that?

Author: Dharsi
Message: Yeah, connected devices. That's a field that's about to blow up in the near future, I guarantee it.

Author: Andrew
Message: I heard it would yes!

Author: Dharsi
Message: Now, there's something I wanted to mention: this site looks very... French. The University of Paris, Baptiste Jacquet... Can you speak French?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nah I'm Canadian. I'm sure the host could though.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Dharsi
Message: Is it possible to speak to both actors before giving my answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: It's only a temporary answer. You'll be asked again after the second conversation.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Very well. While I am not certain, some things point to this actor being a human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. The second conversation will begin. Andrew will start, and you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Dharsi
Message: Hello Andrew!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Dharsi
Message: I'm doing well. Slow, but enjoyable day. What about you?

Author: Andrew
Message: Pretty much the same actually. Still early though.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Oh, what time is it?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's 9:14 AM. What time is it for you?

Author: Dharsi
Message: It is 3:15 PM. I'm guessing you live in North America?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah I'm Canadian. I live in London right now.

Author: Dharsi
Message: I'm sorry, but I didn't get that. You're not in London right now, or else it would be 2 PM, right?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's London, Ontario. In north America settlers had creative names. Paris is about 2 hours away in car.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Oh, right. I forgot about this. And I've been to Canada, I've even seen a road sign leading to London, I should have remembered.

Author: Andrew
Message: No worries, it's not really a big city.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Anyway, what are you up to today?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much. Probably just going to take a shower and watch some TV, or play games.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Ooh, that's interesting. What kind of games do you play?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly Minecraft. I've played Mass Effect Andromeda for most of the last week though.

Author: Dharsi
Message: Whoa, these are two very different games. You still play Minecraft, after all those years?

Author: Andrew
Message: To be fair I've started late. I actually own a server, so my interest in it remains high. The game on its own gets pretty boring.

Author: Dharsi
Message: I get that. There's only so much time I could spend on the game before getting bored of it. What's your server?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's a mix between multiple things. Trying to keep medieval/fantasy themed, but also trying to mix aspects of other games like SimCity and Civilization.

Author: Dharsi
Message: SimCity and Civ? In Minecraft? I'm having trouble picturing the two mechanics together. Can you give me the name of the server? I have two friends who would love to check it out.

Author: Andrew
Message: It's called Project Mango, it's still in development though. Basically it's meant to encourage building cities and empires. Mixing micro and macro management.

Author: Dharsi
Message: This seems so deep and rich. It might even get me back into the game. Thanks for that!

Author: Andrew
Message: You're welcome. You've been playing minecraft much?

Author: Dharsi
Message: I have kind of stopped, since there was no reason to really play it anymore, apart from minigames servers. But now I might pick it up again, if Project Mango sees the light of day.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Dharsi
Message: I think I was talking to an AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Dharsi
Message: You're welcome!

Author: Moderator
Message: You can now close this window.
